All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.faces.component.StateHolder, javax.faces.component.ValueHolder, netgest.bo.xwc.components.security.SecurableComponent
public class OutputHtml
extends ViewerOutputSecurityBase

The OutputHtml components allow to directly output an HTML string from a Bean property to the Viewer

Author:
jcarreira
